message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your time, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value, but I'm confident this product is worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
